info_CN: 减论Agent通过算法为您推荐
中山大学、香港大学与越南科学技术部介绍了 DetailGen3D 方法
该方法通过在潜在空间中基于数据驱动的流实现粗到细的形状转换
结合 token 匹配策略确保空间对应性
从而高效提升由单视角或稀疏多视角生成的三维形状的几何细节

a generative approach that enhances 3D shapes by modeling coarse-to-fine transformation through data-dependent flows in latent space and employing a token matching strategy to ensure accurate spatial correspondence during refinement
info_EN: a generative approach that enhances 3D shapes by modeling coarse-to-fine transformation through data-dependent flows in latent space and employing a token matching strategy to ensure accurate spatial correspondence during refinement
